description: a(1) = a(2) = 1; for n >2, a(n) = smallest prime factor of n-th Fibonacci number.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (derived from Kelly's data)
mathematica: f[n_] := (FactorInteger@ Fibonacci@ n)[[1,1]]; Array[f, 70] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 07 2007 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 03 2001
extensions: Better definition from _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 25 2008
